message: The DATA_COMP field for indicator 4-1-1a, translated into all languages

data.en:
# Methodology

## Computation method
The number of children and/or young people at the relevant stage of education n in year t achieving at least the pre-defined proficiency level in subject s expressed as a percentage of the number of children and/or young people at stage of education n, in year t, in any proficiency level in subject s.

$$MPL_{t,n,s} = {MP_{t,n,s} / P_{t,n}}$$

where: 

$MPL_{t,n,s}$ = the number of children and young people at stage of education n, in year t, who have achieved at least the minimum proficiency level in subject s.

$P_{t,n}$ = the number of children and young people at stage of education n, in year t, in any proficiency level in subject s.

$n$ = the stage of education that was assessed

$s$ = the subject that was assessed (reading or mathematics).
